name: HypeSim
description:
You have the length of one timeout to get as many new fans as possible!

Quickly toss shirts to excited crowd members to convert them to fans for life. Leave them hanging too long though, and they'll become stone-faced haters.

Controls:
* Hold down left mouse button to build up force for the throw and use the pointer to influence its direction

* Once the shirt has landed, use the right mouse button to load another shirt

* Use the right mouse button to start the round and to load a new one after the current has finished

Notes:
Game is a prototype for a VR experience. I did finish the game during the jam, but I will be doing a few updates to clean up and refine. If you have feature ideas, please let me know in the comments!
